trans-unit.source: Exposes a data item in an <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: Expõe um item de dados em uma coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> para a Automação da Interface do Usuário.

trans-unit.source: Data items that are not also <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> types do not have children; however, they can have a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree and a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: Itens de dados que não são também <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tipos não têm filhos; no entanto, elas podem ter um <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árvore e correspondente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> can have a collection of strings that contain data items.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ListBox> pode ter uma coleção de cadeias de caracteres que contêm itens de dados.

trans-unit.source: When those items are processed by an <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> for visualization, a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree is created for them.
trans-unit.target: Quando esses itens são processados por um <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl> para visualização, uma <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árvore é criada para eles.

trans-unit.source: This tree can have a corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: Essa árvore pode ter um correspondente [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore.

trans-unit.source: After the tree is created, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] merges the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree into a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree.
trans-unit.target: Depois que a árvore é criada, [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] mescla o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árvore em um [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] árvore.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> works with its <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> counterpart, if it exists, to obtain more information about the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> tree.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> funciona com seu <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> correspondente, se ele existir, para obter mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árvore.

trans-unit.source: Only visible data items, or more precisely, the corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> trees, have this dualism.
trans-unit.target: Somente os itens de dados visíveis ou mais precisamente, correspondente <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árvores, tiver este dualism.

trans-unit.source: Non-visible data items, which have no corresponding <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> trees, have only one <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: Itens de dados não visíveis, não tem nenhum correspondente <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> árvores, tem apenas um <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: The data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> que está associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that holds the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> associado à <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> que contém a coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" />.

trans-unit.source: Provides initialization for base class values when called by the constructor of a derived class.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a inicialização para valores de classe base quando chamado pelo construtor de uma classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the accelerator key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave de aceleração para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> que está associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The accelerator key.
trans-unit.target: A tecla de atalho.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAcceleratorKey%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the access key for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a chave de acesso para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> que está associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The access key.
trans-unit.target: A chave de acesso.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAccessKey%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia de caracteres que identifica de forma exclusiva o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> que está associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identifier.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o identificador [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: The value of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identifier is the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O valor de [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] identificador é o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> property is not set, the value is the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationProperties.AutomationId%2A> propriedade não for definida, o valor é o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Name%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationId%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> that represents the bounding rectangle of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Rect" /> que representa o retângulo delimitador do <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The bounding rectangle.
trans-unit.target: O retângulo delimitador.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetBoundingRectangle%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of child elements of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de elementos filho do <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> que está associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The collection of child elements.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de elementos filho.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetChildren%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> that represents the clickable space that is on the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um <see cref="T:System.Windows.Point" /> que representa o espaço clicável no <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The point that represents the clickable space that is on the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: O ponto que representa o espaço clicável no <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClickablePoint%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a cadeia de caracteres que descreve a funcionalidade do <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> que está associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The help text.
trans-unit.target: O texto de ajuda.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetHelpText%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that conveys the visual status of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres que transmite o status visual do <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The status.
trans-unit.target: O status.

trans-unit.source: Examples include "Busy" or "Online".
trans-unit.target: Exemplos incluem “Ocupado” ou “Online”.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemStatus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a human-readable string that contains the type of item that the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma cadeia de caracteres legível por humanos que contém o tipo de item representado pelo <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The item type.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de item.

trans-unit.source: An example includes "Mail Message" or "Contact".
trans-unit.target: Um exemplo inclui “Mensagem de Email” ou “Contato”.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetItemType%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> that is targeted to the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer" /> para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> que é direcionado para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> para o elemento que é o destino de <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the notification characteristics of the live region for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém as características de notificação da região dinâmica para o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> associada a esse objeto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The notification characteristics of the live region.
trans-unit.target: As características de notificação da região dinâmica.

trans-unit.source: Gets the text label of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o rótulo de texto do <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> que corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> que está associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The text label.
trans-unit.target: O rótulo de texto.

trans-unit.source: You can think of the name property as if it were a string of text that users use to explain which control they are referring to.
trans-unit.target: Você pode pensar a propriedade name como se fosse uma cadeia de caracteres de texto que os usuários usam para explicar o controle está referenciando.

trans-unit.source: Make certain that you have a textual representation for all controls in the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] so that you can programmatically refer to the control in a localized manner.
trans-unit.target: Certifique-se de que você tenha uma representação textual para todos os controles de [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_gui](~/includes/tlasharptla-gui-md.md)] para que você pode consultar programaticamente o controle de maneira localizada.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetName%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is laid out in a particular direction.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado é disposto em uma direção específica.

trans-unit.source: The direction of the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: A direção do <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: Optionally, the method returns <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is not laid out in a particular direction.
trans-unit.target: Opcionalmente, o método retorna <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationOrientation.None" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> não está disposto em uma direção específica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetOrientation%2A>.

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: Um valor de enumeração que especifica o padrão de controle.

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o objeto que dá suporte ao padrão de controle especificado do elemento que está associado a este par de automação.

trans-unit.source: An object that supports the control pattern if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que é compatível com o padrão de controle se <paramref name="patternInterface" /> é for um valor compatível; caso contrário, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.VirtualizedItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the item is not in the visual tree, this method returns a `this` pointer.
trans-unit.target: Se `patternInterface` é <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.VirtualizedItem?displayProperty=nameWithType> e o item não está na árvore visual, esse método retorna um `this` ponteiro.

trans-unit.source: If `patternInterface` equals <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput?displayProperty=nameWithType>, this method returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Se `patternInterface` é igual a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.SynchronizedInput?displayProperty=nameWithType>, esse método retorna um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISynchronizedInputProvider> interface.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> currently has keyboard input focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado atualmente tem o foco de entrada de teclado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> has keyboard input focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> tem o foco de entrada do teclado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.HasKeyboardFocus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado contém dados que são apresentados ao usuário.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is a content element; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o elemento for um elemento de conteúdo; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsContentElement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> is understood by the end user as interactive.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> associada a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" /> é compreendido pelo usuário final como interativo.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element is a control; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o elemento for um controle; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados no <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: The user might understand the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> as contributing to the logical structure of the control in the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O usuário pode entender o <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> como que contribuem para a estrutura lógica do controle no [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_gui](~/includes/tla2sharptla-gui-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsControlElement%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> can receive and send events.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado pode receber e enviar eventos.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] peer can receive and send events; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o par [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] pode receber e enviar eventos; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsEnabled%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> can accept keyboard focus.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado pode aceitar o foco do teclado.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can accept keyboard focus; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o elemento puder aceitar o foco do teclado; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsKeyboardFocusable%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is off the screen.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado está fora da tela.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is not on the screen; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado não está na tela; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsOffscreen%2A>.

trans-unit.source: This method does not indicate whether the element is visible.
trans-unit.target: Esse método não indica se o elemento está visível.

trans-unit.source: In some circumstances, an element is on the screen but is still not visible.
trans-unit.target: Em algumas circunstâncias, um elemento está na tela, mas ainda não está visível.

trans-unit.source: For example, if the element is obscured by other elements, it might not be visible.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se o elemento é obscurecido por outros elementos, ele não fiquem visível.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o método retornará `false`.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> contains protected content.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado contém um conteúdo protegido.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> contains protected content; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado contém conteúdo protegido; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsPassword%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is required to be completed on a form.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado é de preenchimento obrigatório em um formulário.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> is required to be completed; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se o <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado deve ser preenchido; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponds to the data item in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> collection that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items%2A> associado a este <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer>.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.IsRequiredForForm%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> que está associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: The data item.
trans-unit.target: O item de dados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> that holds the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> associado ao <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> que contém a coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> object.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemsControlAutomationPeer" /> que está associado a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl" /> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Sets the keyboard input focus on the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" />.
trans-unit.target: Define o foco de entrada do teclado no <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> corresponds to the data item in the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> collection that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Windows.UIElement" /> corresponde ao item de dados na coleção <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl.Items" /> associado a este <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer" />.

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Este método é chamado por <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.SetFocus%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Makes the virtual item fully accessible as a UI Automation element.
trans-unit.target: Torna o item virtual totalmente acessível como um elemento de Automação da interface do usuário.

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: Este membro é uma implementação do membro de interface explícita.

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: Ele só pode ser usado quando a instância de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ItemAutomationPeer> é convertida em uma interface de <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider>.
